questions.question: Which is an example of intrinsic motivation?

choices.answer: Feeling accomplished after finishing a race
A financial payment
Cheering from the crowd
Recognition by sponsors

choices.answer: performance is driven by reinforcing behaviour
performance is improved out of fear
performance is improved by negative thoughts
performance is at it's optimum arousal
when your internal state is modified by sources outside
trophies, awards or a feeling of accomplishment
Comes from within
A massive feed after a training session
A form of anxiety caused by a certain situation
a non specific response of the body to a demand placed on it
Specific level of anxiety experienced prior to or during
general level of stress that is characteristic of individual
